description.displayText: Grace is a fantastic caregiver, full of creativity and fun.  With tons of experience, she really gets kids and actively engages with them while they are in her care.  She is responsible and dedicated, and I would not hesitate to recommend her for a care-giving position.
description.originalText: Grace is a fantastic caregiver, full of creativity and fun.  With tons of experience, she really gets kids and actively engages with them while they are in her care.  She is responsible and dedicated, and I would not hesitate to recommend her for a care-giving position.

description.displayText: Grace is a fantastic nanny. She watched my 1 year old and if she hadn't moved I would still have her watching my child. She made sure my child was well taken care of and always kept her entertained and happy. She genuinely cares for my daughter and checks in regularly to see how much she has grown.
description.originalText: Grace is a fantastic nanny. She watched my 1 year old and if she hadn't moved I would still have her watching my child. She made sure my child was well taken care of and always kept her entertained and happy. She genuinely cares for my daughter and checks in regularly to see how much she has grown.

description.displayText:
Grace was a blessing sent when I needed help the most! I was hesitant to hire a younger nanny because of how difficult toddlers (18mo & 3) naturally are, but after meeting with Grace and seeing her immediate connection with my kids, I knew she was the one. Grace had a way of working with my children that was so tender and patient while still being reliable and professional. I'm thankful to have met someone so wise beyond her years who made being a single mother feel more manageable. Grace will always be a part of our little family. 

From my family to yours
Liliana, J., and baby K.
